actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide that savings banks shall not be considered to be State banks for purposes of determining whether a national bank may establish and operate any branch.

summary.text: Stipulates that savings banks shall not be considered State banks in determining whether a national bank may establish and operate a branch.

titles.title: A bill to provide that savings banks shall not be considered to be State banks for purposes of determining whether a national bank may establish and operate any branch.
